page.title: 08Homelife in Sidcup
page.content:
{ From Survey By Local Schoolboy ! Surveyor: Paul Slater.
{ Family Size:}Most people (school boys) have 2 or 3 Brothers or Sisters, making the average family size 4-6. { Pets:}The surveyor had a Dog, Guinea Pig and Rabbit, which was found to be typical. The survey showed that Dogs and Cats were the most popular pets followed by Rabbits. { Contents:}The appliances in the surveyors' house were 3 televisions, 1 stereo, 1 fridge, 1 freezer, 2 phones and 1 washing machine. The Survey showed that everyone had 1 T.V. if not 3. Every family was found to have a fridge, freezer and a washing machine. Some families also had tumble dryers, microwave ovens or videos. The average number of telephones was 3 phones for every 2 families.
